General.Name: Armada Bilgisayar Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Armada Bilgisayar Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a distributor in the information technology (IT) sector in Turkey. It offers IT products and solutions to end users through business partners. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Armada Bilgisayar Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Aptec Holdings Ltd.
